verses.name: Acts 20:16
verses.text: For Paul had determined to sail by Ephesus, because he would not spend the time in Asia: for he hasted, if it were possible for him, to be at Jerusalem the day of Pentecost.

verses.name: Acts 20:17
verses.text: And from Miletus he sent to Ephesus, and called the elders of the church.

verses.name: Acts 20:18
verses.text: And when they were come to him, he said unto them, Ye know, from the first day that I came into Asia, after what manner I have been with you at all seasons,
